Entries.companionAccepted: Sure, I could use some fresh air.$h
Entries.companionAccepted_Dating: I'd be happy to go with you, @.$8
Entries.companionAccepted_Spouse: Of course I will, honey. I'm always eager to be by your side.$8
Entries.companionRejected: I'm sorry, I have to prepare some sheet music for work.$s
Entries.companionRejected_Dating: Could we do a raincheck, @? I'm just so busy today...$6#$b#Some other time, okay? Take care.$h
Entries.companionRejected_Spouse: Sorry, dear. I can't right now... I'm not really in the mood for a stroll.$s#$b#I'll just wait for you at home, okay?$h#$b#I'll keep the bed warm for you.$9
Entries.companionRejectedNight: Now? Don't you think it's a bit late for that?$6#$#Sorry, @, but I'll have to pass...$s
Entries.companionRejectedNight_Dating: It's awfully late, @.$7#$b#Not to mention dark... And eerie...$s
Entries.companionRejectedNight_Spouse: I'm sorry, I just don't have the energy to go running around at this hour.$s#$b#But I'll make it up to you when you get back, I promise.$9
Entries.companionDismiss: Thank you for bringing me along. I had a lot of fun!$h#$b#We should do this again soon.
Entries.companionDismiss_Dating: I had a great time with you today, @.$1#$b#I'm looking forward to going on more adventures with you soon.$1
Entries.companionDismiss_Spouse: I had a great time, @.$h#$b#Stay safe. I love you, honey <$4
Entries.companionDismissAuto: You and I both have to get up early, so it's probably best that I head home now.#$b#Don't stay out too late, @.
Entries.companionDismissAuto_Dating: Well, I'm gonna head back to the hotel now, honey.#$b#Hm... Any chance I could tempt you into spending the night with me?$9#$b#Well, I'll be waiting...$9
Entries.companionDismissAuto_Spouse: C'mon, honey, let's head home.#$b#Don't want to? Well, what if I promise to make it worth your while?$9
Entries.companionRecruited: I wonder what adventures await us today, @?$1
Entries.companionRecruited~1: I may not be of much use fighting, but I'm plenty tall, so maybe I'll make a good human shield...?$3
Entries.companionRecruited_Dating: So, what are we doing today?$h#$b#Oh, I know! Maybe we could go up to the Ridge and watch the fish for a while?$8
Entries.companionRecruited_Dating~1: Hm... Honey, do we have to go fight monsters today?$s#$b#Because when you asked me to explore town alone with you, I had some other things in mind...$9
Entries.companionRecruited_Spouse: Spending time with you is more than I could ever ask for.$l#$b#So, where do you want to go, @?$h
Entries.companionRecruited_Spouse~1: You know I love traveling with you, honey.$1#$b#No matter where you take me, it always feels like home with you by my side.$l
Entries.companion_Farm: You've done an amazing job with the farm.$h
Entries.companion_Farm~1: The crops are so vibrantly colored and the backdrop is beautiful.#$b#What you've built here is a true work of art.
Entries.companion_Farm_Rainy: Ugh, rain!?$a#$b#...We should get inside asap, @. Too long out here and my hair gel will get all sticky.$s
Entries.companion_Farm_Snowy: Cold weather really is superior.#$b#You can always put more layers on, but there's a limit to how many you can take off, y'know?$h#$e#Hm, you don't know? Well, perhaps I could show you, then...$9
Entries.companion_Farm_Spring: Say, do you grow any fruit trees? Alissa told me about the ones her family grows, and I've been dying to try some.$h
Entries.companion_Farm_Summer: I always get teased for being named after a summer month yet hating the heat...$s#$b#But in my native language, "June" isn't a month, it's just a name. It's not my fault it's contradictory.$s
Entries.companion_Farm_Fall: Say, are you able to make apple juice? Not apple wine, just juice.#$b#...Oh. That's a shame.$s
Entries.companion_Farm_Winter: What sort of things do you do on your farm in the winter, @? Could you show me?$h
Entries.companionEnter_Farm: I can really tell how much of yourself you've poured into this farm, @.$h#$b#It's funny, even your farm is so distinctly "you".$8
Entries.companionEnter_Farm_Night: It's getting late, @. I'll have to head home soon.
Entries.companion_Farm_Night: The night here is simply breathtaking.$h
Entries.companion_Farm_Dating: It's astonishing how you take care of the farm all by yourself, @. I think it's amazing.$h#$b#But then again, you always amaze me.$l
Entries.companion_Farm_Dating~1: Hm, maybe I should move out of the hotel and live here instead?$h#$b#Oh, I wouldn't intrude. You could just stick me in the doghouse and bring me inside when you feel like it.$9
Entries.companion_Farm_Rainy_Dating: The rain is really coming down...$s#$b#Do you have an umbrella on you? If not, I could cover you with my coat.
Entries.companion_Farm_Snowy_Dating: @, here, come closer.$h#$b#Stay tight against me and I promise I'll keep you warm.$l
Entries.companion_Farm_Fall_Dating: There's nothing in this world as beautiful as the fall colors.$8#$b#Well, with one notable exception.$9
Entries.companion_Farm_Winter_Dating: You know how each snowflake is a unique, beautiful crystal glimmer that never repeats twice?$h#$b#That's exactly what each moment with you feels like.$l
Entries.companionEnter_Farm_Dating: Hmm...$h#$b#Oh, I just... I can see myself staying here with you, is all. It's... homey.$l
Entries.companionEnter_Farm_Night_Dating: It's a beautiful night for a stroll, don't you think?$1
Entries.companion_Farm_Night_Dating: This place is so big... Do you ever get lost here?#$b#I know I would. I have the navigational skills of a Roomba.$s
Entries.companion_Farm_Spouse: My love, you are so good at what you do.$l#$b#I know I'm no expert, but in all my travels, this farm is the best I've seen.$h
Entries.companion_Farm_Spouse~1: Honey, do you speak any foreign languages?$l#$b#Well, tu sei l'amore della mia vita <$4#$e#Oh, I don't actually speak the language.#$b#Actually, I asked Lorenzo to teach that phrase to me so I could say it to you... Is that weird?$s
Entries.companion_Farm_Rainy_Spouse: Look at you! You're absolutely soaked.$h#$b#Good thing you have me to take care of you. Now let's get inside, shall we?$9
Entries.companion_Farm_Snowy_Spouse: Oh, honey, you're shivering! My poor baby...$7#$b#Come closer to me, love. I'll warm you right up.$l
Entries.companion_Farm_Spring_Spouse: Oh no, I can feel my eyes itching already... I think I forgot to take allergy medicine today.$7#$b#I swear, I never got allergies this bad until I came here.$s#$b#But don't worry. It's all worth it just to be here, to be with you.$l
Entries.companion_Farm_Summer_Spouse: Okay, I've got to get out of these clothes before I melt.$s#$b#@, I need you to take me inside and cut the clothes off me like a paramedic treating an emergency victim.$3#$b#...Just kidding. Please don't ever cut my clothes up. I *will* cry.$7
Entries.companion_Farm_Fall_Spouse: Fall has always been my favorite season, but after moving here, I don't see how anyone couldn't love it as much as I do.$h#$b#The forest turns such beautiful shades of red and gold and everything in between... It feels like I'm living in a dream.$h#$b#But then again, maybe that's just because I'm living with you.$l
Entries.companion_Farm_Winter_Spouse: Sometimes winter can get too cold even for me, but at least it gives me an excuse to snuggle with you.$h#$b#Not that I ever need an excuse. How about we go warm up by the fire right now?$9
Entries.companionEnter_Farm_Spouse: Ah... Every time I enter, it feels like the first time.$h#$b#What? Of course I meant the farm, honey! Tsk tsk, get your mind out of the gutter.$9
Entries.companionEnter_Farm_Night_Spouse: Home sweet home!$h#$b#That was exhausting, but every second spent with you is worth it.$l#$b#Now, what do you say we go recharge?$9
Entries.companion_Farm_Night_Spouse: ...Oh, did you say something, honey?$7#$b#Sorry, I was lost in your eyes.$h#$b#Though I'd rather like to get lost in you right now...$9
Entries.companion_Town: I need to remember to organize my sheet music.#$b#Did I bring all of it to the lobby already?$3
Entries.companion_Town~1: Such a quaint little town, but it's homey.$1
Entries.companion_Town_Rainy: The sound of rain is so calming, don't you think?$h
Entries.companion_Town_Night: I'm glad I get to be here. You'd never see stars in Zuzu City like this.$4
Entries.companion_Town_Night~1: Midnight strolls are always nice. It's a great opportunity to clear your head.$h
Entries.companion_Custom_Ridgeside_RidgesideVill: Strolling around the village is a great way to pass the time.$1#$b#If only I didn't have to work so often...$s#$b#Not that I don't enjoy my work, of course! There's just... so little time in the day, y'know?$7
I always start off my week with a walk around the whole village. Want me to show you my route?$1#$b#It's rather long, but somehow I don't think a bit more alone time with you would hurt.$9
Ooh, let's visit Pika's if we have the time.$h#$b#The things that man can do with a clove of garlic should be studied by world peace ambassadors.$8
Entries.companion_Custom_Ridgeside_PaulaClinic: Have you not been feeling well? Please take care of yourself, @.$7
Entries.companion_Custom_Ridgeside_LogCabinHotel: Did you know this piano is nearly forty years old? Richard has taken such good care of it, you'd never guess.$1

...Oh, what's this? The key to my private hotel room that's only one floor above us fell out of my pocket!$6#$b#It's a good thing I found it, seeing as it's the only key, to a room I have all to myself, with a bed in it, and did I mention all the privacy...?$9
Oh, the hotel?$6#$b#Don't tell me, you want to rent a room together?$l#$b#Great minds. I can't tell you how many times I thought about sneaking you into my room back when we were dating...$9
The rooms in the hotel are a bit cramped, but I don't mind.#$b#It just encourages me to get out more and do stuff like this.$h

...$3#$e#What am I thinking about? Oh, nothing, just how easy it would be to take you to my room, lock the door behind us, and make you–$9#$b#Ugh, nevermind. If I say anymore, I'll be in actual pain.$2
...Be careful now, @. If you're trying to tempt me, I can guarantee it'll only end with Richard fining us for a noise violation.$9
Do you want to go to the gym?#$b#Hm, I'm not really dressed for it, so I'll have to pass, but I assure you I can do plenty of lifting.$9

Are you going to work out?#$b#Well, I'm happy to spot you if you want, but I'm pretty sure I'll get far too distracted to do it right.$9#$b#Maybe we should just skip to the post-workout stretch? Now *that's* something I can do for you right.$9

Hey, honey... Remember that time we snuck out onto the balcony together?$9#$b#It was freezing cold, but the warmth of your skin on mine felt like it would make me melt, and I...$l#$b#...Dammit. Can we just go home already? If you're trying to tease me into submission, you've more than succeeded.$5
Entries.companion_Custom_Ridgeside_RidgeFalls: Ah, how serene...!$8#$b#I just can't believe a place this romantic is tucked away back here, right under everyone's noses.$h#$b#Thank you for bringing me here, @.$8
Entries.companion_Custom_Ridgeside_RidgeFalls_Da: I could spend forever here with you, @.$h#$b#Just you and me, lying in the grass, listening to the water trickle by us, while I pick tiny pink petals out of your hair and cover you in kisses...$l
Entries.companion_Custom_Ridgeside_RidgeFalls_Sp: Hm... How cold do you think this water is? It looks like it'd be warm, don't you think?#$b#Because I'd love nothing more than to jump into this lake with you.$h
Entries.companion_Beach: I've always loved coming to the beach.$1#$b#The only issue is the sand gets everywhere...$3#$b#And I do mean everywhere...$s
Entries.companion_Beach_Winter: The snow and the sea... Some people don't get to see either in their lifetimes, but here we are with both right in front of us.$h#$b#I don't know. It just makes me think that, no matter how much I've been through, I'm still so blessed to be surrounded by nature.$h
Entries.companion_Saloon: The saloon? Hey, I'm always down.$h#$b#Let's just not stay too long, okay? Because– Hm, how to put this delicately...$s#$b#The more I drink, the more cocky I get, and soon enough I'll invite you back to my room for what I'll pretend is an "after-party"...$3#$b#That or I'll hit on the jukebox. One of the two.$s
Entries.companion_Saloon_Dating: A drink? ...No, I really shouldn't.$s#$b#Hey, don't look at me like that. I could drink you under the table if I wanted. Back in Zuzu I used to pound–$9#$b#...And that's exactly why I won't.$s
Entries.companion_Saloon_Spouse: ...Psst, honey. Could you order the peach cocktail and pretend like it's for you, and then sneak it to me?$7#$b#...I know, I know. I shouldn't be embarrassed, but... please?$s
Entries.companion_Custom_Ridgeside_RSVCliff: It's awfully windy up here, but doesn't the breeze feel nice?$8
Entries.companion_Custom_Ridgeside_RSVCliff_Dati: Honey, come here. Let's just sit on the bench and relax a bit.$h@#b#I want to take some time to admire the world that brought me to you.$l
Entries.companion_Custom_Ridgeside_RSVCliff_Spou: Want to know a secret, honey?$h#$b#Whenever it's just the two of us in the cable car, my mind can't help but drift to all the things I could do to you in ten minutes...$9
Entries.companion_Custom_Ridgeside_Ridge: I'm glad this place is so close to the hotel. It's a great place to come and sit on the swing, watch the fish, clear my head...$h
Entries.companion_Custom_Ridgeside_Ridge_Dating: Honey, how about I sit on the swing and you sit in my lap?$h#$b#Don't worry about it falling, I'll hold you tight.$l
Entries.companion_Custom_Ridgeside_Ridge_Spouse: Why don't we sit on the edge of the dock together for a bit?$8#$b#...Actually, nevermind. I'd be tempted to kiss you, and then I'd be tempted to do more than just kiss you, and that makes it all too likely for us to fall in.$h
Entries.companion_Custom_Ridgeside_RSVNinjaHouse: ...What exactly is this place? Though I get the feeling that I'm not supposed to know...$s
Entries.companion_Custom_Ridgeside_LolaShed: Well, this place sure is odd. Who does it belong to?$3#$b#...Lola? Ha ha, very funny. Now really, whose shed is this?$6
Entries.companionSuggest: Hey, @? Can I tag along today?#$q -1 -1#Is it okay for me to follow you today?#$r -1 0 Yes#Yeah sure!#$r -1 0 No#I'm sorry but maybe next time
Entries.companionSuggest_Dating: Say, @... Would you like to go for a walk together?$h#$q -1 -1#Is it okay for me to follow you today?#$r -1 0 Yes#Yeah sure!#$r -1 0 No#I'm sorry but maybe next time
Entries.companionSuggest_Spouse: @? I know you're busy, but I want to spend some more time together...$s#$q -1 -1#Is it okay for me to follow you today?#$r -1 0 Yes#Yeah sure!#$r -1 0 No#I'm sorry but maybe next time
Entries.companionSuggest_Yes: Really?$h#$b#Great, I could use a chance to stretch my legs.$8
Entries.companionSuggest_No: Oh, I'm sorry. I didn't realize you were busy.#$b#Another time, then.$h
Entries.companionSuggest_No_Dating: Oh, no worries! We'll catch up later.$h
Entries.companionSuggest_Yes_Spouse: You mean it? Great!$8#$b#Sorry if I'm being clingy. I just really like hanging out with you. You're my best friend, y'know?$l
Entries.companionSuggest_No_Spouse: Oh, okay...$s#$b#Don't be gone too long, though. I'm already starting to miss you.$l
